Are we filtering by JPG?
Also, is it possible to upload more than one image for a particular field? If so fieldId alone won't unique.
timeline.author: gino-m

replies.bodyText:
No, we save the bitmap as a .jpg file and that gets uploaded.
Currently, one field can have only one photo. So, the old one gets overwritten if re-uploaded.
